attributes.action: Require the MHRA to publish its investigations into Covid 19 Yellow Card Reports
attributes.additional_details:
Covid 19 vaccines have been administered to millions of people.  The UK MHRA Yellow Card system is the well-established check on the safety of any vaccine (or therapy).  
The MHRA should publish the results of its investigations into these reports so as to establish that the reports are not the result of adverse effects.
attributes.background:
399,731 adverse reaction reports to the Covid 19 vaccines have been submitted to the UK MHRA through its Yellow Card system.  Of these 1,822 were deaths following vaccination.  
The UK MHRA has not published any analysis or follow up investigation of these reports.  It should be required to do so.
